snippet: The St. Louis Cardinals rookie Taveras was drunk at the time of his fatal car crash last month in the Dominican Republic, a spokeswoman for the country’s attorney general’s office said Wednesday.
abstract: Toxicology reports show that St Louis Cardinals rookie Oscar Taveras was drunk at the time of his fatal car crash in Dominican Republic in October.
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Cardinals rookie Taveras was drunk at the time of his fatal car crash last month in the Dominican Republic, a spokeswoman for the country’s attorney general’s office said Wednesday.

headline.main: Alcohol Linked to Oscar Taveras’s Fatal Crash
